Our reconstructed temperature estimates for the period 1902–1955 derived from the dendrochronological time series, which was missing from the available observation on the local weather station
29, 31 , well matched the periods of extreme cold temperatures in 1902–1906, 1913–1915, 1922–1923, 1926–1928 and 1950–1952 recorded by other biological and non-biological sources at comparable regional
56– 58 and continental scales
59, 60 .
